column4: I think linux is comming to maturity, it has the core, the tools, it just needs tweeking

it has had that  basically for ages now on the server and the super computers, it's just the desktop hmm, but that's getting there to, even though most software companies and hardware companies do not suppourt it properly or at at all yet
the repos have  good software in them
I don't like offtopic much, but I am in there now
